text: Delara Burkhardt (born on November 3, 1992, in Hamburg, Germany) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party. She has been a Member of the European Parliament since 2019. She is a member of the European Parliament Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety. Burkhardt is part of the European Parliament Intergroup on LGBT Rights,Members European Parliament Intergroup on LGBTI Rights. the European Parliament Intergroup on Seas, Rivers, Islands and Coastal Areas,Members 2019-2024 European Parliament Intergroup on Seas, Rivers, Islands and Coastal Areas. and of the Responsible Business Conduct Working Group too.Members Responsible Business Conduct Working Group. Being a little one, Burkhardt lived in Siek in Schleswig- Holstein. She studied political science at the University of Kiel from 2012 until 2016. On February 4, 2021, she undertook support for Katsyaryna Andreeva, Belarusian political prisoner. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:MEPs for Germany Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Hamburg
title: Delara Burkhardt
